items.title: WATCH:  Woman wins award impersonating a pigeon
items.description: British artist Miriam Abrahams spent four weeks building her costume and took the prize at Pigeon Fest in New York City.

items.title: Minnesota lawmakers shooting suspect Vance Boelter due in court Monday
items.description: The man suspected of shooting and killing a Minnesota lawmaker and her husband and shooting and wounding a second lawmaker and his wife is due in cour...

items.title: WATCH:  Trump announced presidential run 10 years ago today
items.description: In 2015, Donald Trump was the 12th Republican to announce his candidacy after descending a golden escalator at Trump Tower in New York.

items.title: WATCH:  Flash floods destroy homes and wash away roads in West Virginia
items.description: There is a state of emergency in West Virgina where at least three people are dead and several missing from flash flooding Saturday night.

items.title: Air India flight returns to Hong Kong due to a midair technical issue
items.description: An Air India flight has returned to Hong Kong shortly after takeoff due to a midair technical issue
